expo.name: Cocktailify
expo.description: Enjoy cocktails wherever and whenever you want. Choose, explore, add to favourites, save ingredients to your shopping list! The app even works as a cocktail shaker - shake it and it will offer you a new cocktail every time, you just have to choose! Made by Natalia Zinovyeva as a study project for the "Mobile Programming" course. Helsinki, 2020.
